programme.title: Dr Strangelove and the Soviet spy satellite
programme.short_synopsis: The appalling possibilities revealed since the crash of a Soviet spy satellite.
programme.medium_synopsis: As a Soviet spy satellite fuelled by nuclear power plunges to earth above Canada, has military technology acquiring a momentum independent of human control?

display_title.subtitle: Dr Strangelove and the Soviet spy satellite

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
